data.title: New York N.Y. Portrait einer Weltstadt., Photographiert von Hilla und Max Jacoby. Mit einem Essay von Thilo Koch. - German Language Book. by Jacoby, Hilla, Max Jacoby und Thilo Koch:: FINE+, Near New
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9783455087833 - First Edition By This Publisher. - Cloth - Hoffmann und Campe, Hamburg - 1981 - Condition: FINE+, Near New - Near FINE Dust Jacket. - >>>> Over 500 grams >> Because these are very HEAVY, no overseas orders without contacting us first., as extra postage will be needed. Thank-you >>> 228 Colorful photos of New York City. German Language book. >> weight = 2345 grams. Size: 13 1/2" x 9 3/4" - New York N.Y. Portrait einer Weltstadt., Photographiert von Hilla und Max Jacoby. Mit einem Essay von Thilo Koch. - German Language Book.
